alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead; Gallatin; Madison (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 01 at 3:02PM MDT until July 01 at 4:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Great Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Madison County in southwestern Montana... Southeastern Beaverhead County in southwestern Montana... Eastern Gallatin County in south central Montana... * Until 400 PM MDT. * At 259 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles northeast of Belgrade to 7 miles southeast of Bozeman to 9 miles southeast of Ennis to 7 miles northeast of Gilmore, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Public. At 2:54 PM multiple wind gusts to 60 mph were reported on the south side of Bozeman. Strong wind gusts are expected along the rest of this line. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bozeman, Lima, Monida, Dell, Big Sky, Bannack Pass, Lakeview, Cameron, Snowline and Monida Pass. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
